name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Hardware Warning #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %EARL_L3_ASIC-SP-3-INTR_WARN: EARL L3 ASIC: Non-fatal interrupt Netflow interrupt

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Hardware Warning #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %SNMP-5-CHASSISALARM: Chassis Alarm Trap: tmpAlarm(OFF), minorAlarm(ON), and/or majorAlarm(OFF)

patterns.value_re: %SNMP-5-CHASSISALARM: Chassis Alarm Trap: tmpAlarm\(\S+\), minorAlarm\(\S+\), and/or majorAlarm\(\S+\)

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Error #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %PM_SCP-SP-3-GBIC_BAD: GBIC integrity check on port 1/2 failed: bad key

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Error #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %PM_SCP-SP-3-TRANSCEIVER_BAD_EEPROM: Integrity check on transceiver in LAN port 5/1 failed: bad key

patterns.value_re: %PM_SCP-SP-3-TRANSCEIVER_(?:BAD_EEPROM|UNSUPPORTED): (?:Integrity check on|Unsupported) transceiver in LAN port (?P<interface>\S+)( failed: .+)?

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Error #3 (SYSLOG)
description: %CONST_DIAG-SP-4-ERROR_COUNTER_WARNING: Module 4 Error counter exceeds threshold

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Error #4 (SYSLOG)
description: %DIAG-SP-3-MINOR_HW: Module 1: Online Diagnostics detected Minor Hardware Error

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Error #5 (SYSLOG)
description: %GBIC_SECURITY_UNIQUE-4-DUPLICATE_SN: GBIC interface 0/1 has the same serial number as another GBIC interface.

patterns.value_re: %GBIC_SECURITY_UNIQUE-(?:3|4)-DUPLICATE_(?:GBIC|SN): (?P<module>GBIC) interface (?P<interface>\d+/\d+) (?:is a duplicate of|has the same serial number as another) GBIC interface

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Error #6 (SYSLOG)
description: %PHY-4-SFP_NOT_SUPPORTED: The SFP in Gi0/1 is not supported

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Error #7 (SYSLOG)
description: %PM_SCP-SP-2-LCP_FW_ERR_INFORM: Module 4 is experiencing the following error: Bus Asic #0 transient Pb error

patterns.value_re: %PM_SCP(-SP)?-2-LCP_FW_ERR_INFORM: Module (?P<module>\d+) is experiencing the following error: (?P<reason>.+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Error #8 (SYSLOG)
description: %PM_SCP-SP-1-LCP_FW_ERR: System resetting module 13 to recover from error: Linecard received system exception

patterns.value_re: %PM_SCP-SP-1-LCP_FW_ERR: System resetting module (?P<module>\d+) to recover from error: (?P<reason>.+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Inserted #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %OIR-SP-6-INSCARD: Card inserted in slot 3, interfaces are now online

patterns.value_re: %OIR-SP-6-INSCARD: Card inserted in (?P<module>slot \S+), interfaces are now online

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Removed #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %OIR-SP-6-REMCARD: Card removed from slot 9, interfaces disabled

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Inserted #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %C4K_IOSINTF-5-TRANSCEIVERINSERTED: Slot=1 Port=3: Transceiver has been inserted

patterns.value_re: %C4K_IOSINTF-5-TRANSCEIVERINSERTED: Slot=(?P<module>\d+) Port=(?P<interface>\d+): Transceiver has been inserted

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Removed #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %C4K_IOSINTF-5-TRANSCEIVERREMOVED: Slot=1 Port=3: Transceiver has been removed

patterns.value_re: %C4K_IOSINTF-5-TRANSCEIVERREMOVED: Slot=(?P<module>\d+) Port=(?P<interface>\d+): Transceiver has been removed

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Inserted #3 (SYSLOG)
description: %TRANSCEIVER-DFC2-6-INSERTED: transceiver module inserted in TenGigabitEthernet2/0/0

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Module | Module Removed #3 (SYSLOG)
description: %TRANSCEIVER-DFC2-6-REMOVED: Transceiver module removed from TenGigabitEthernet2/0/0

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Hardware Port Error #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %HARDWARE-3-PORTNUM_ERROR: port number 1 is invalid.

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Hardware Port Error #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %HARDWARE-3-ASICNUM_ERROR: Port-ASIC number 1 is invalid.

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Hardware Port Error #3 (SYSLOG)
description: %ILACC-5-LATECOLL: Unit 0, late collision error

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Hardware Port Error #4 (SYSLOG)
description: %PM-4-ERR_DISABLE: gbic-invalid error detected on Gi0/1, putting Gi0/1 in err-disable state

patterns.value_re: %PM-4-ERR_DISABLE: gbic-invalid error detected on (?P<interface>\S+), putting \S+ in err-disable state

name: Cisco | IOS | Chassis | Hardware | Hardware Port Error Recover #4 (SYSLOG)
description: %PM-4-ERR_RECOVER: Attempting to recover from gbic-invalid err-disable state on Gi0/1
event_class__name: Chassis | Hardware | Hardware Port Error Recover

patterns.value_re: %PM-4-ERR_RECOVER: Attempting to recover from gbic-invalid err-disable state on (?P<interface>\S+)
